Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Spaulding
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Kedzie, Augusta, Homan & Chicago, due to fire department activity nr Chicago/Spaulding

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip??

#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Kedzie, Augusta, Homan, then resume their normal route on Chicago, due to fire department activity near Chicago/Spaulding.

Allow extra travel time.
